oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Welcome Fairmen from Variety Attractions
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Twitty, Conway; Lynn, Loretta; Craddock, Billy; Gilley, Mickey; James, Sonny; Gayle, Crystal; Riley, Jeannie C.; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Raye, Susan; Lee, Dickey; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing Variety Attractions entertainment lineup with Conway Twitty, Loretta Lynn, Cal Smith, Billy Craddock, Sonny James, Crystal Gayle, Mickey Gilley, Jeannie C. Riley, Grandpa Jones, the Hagers, Susan Raye, and Dickie Lee. Poster was ordered by Vic Dour of Variety Attractions (purchase order 17208). To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21124.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:accessRights: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws.
